name: Dino Craft
description:
Blocky Dino Craft for all ages
3 Game Mode
1.Epic Battles
Gain experience by defeating other opponents.
Level up your Dinosaurs to increase their health and attack
2.Crossy Dinosaur Road ,collect Coins and buy new Dinos like Pterodactyl, Triceratops, Velociraptor,T-rex, Brontosaur

3.Arena , Biggest battle of most dangerous animals in the history

No in app purchase, pay only one and play forever
App is not affiliated with Minecraft
